Reviews.Title: “Quirky Hotel with Good Value”
Reviews.Author: Pxlgrl
Reviews.Content: hotel quirky value price extremely close tram 2 minutes walk tram lines easy city center lots attractions beds comfy clean cute touches candies pillows staff helpful friendly european continental breakfast featured fresh fruit lots stuff start day breads pastries hard boiled eggs cheese cold cuts free speed internet bit hot included fan helpful didnt lights example lift stairs steep twisty prepared despite quirky design hotel little bit run theres ton stuff immediate vicinity center isnt overall base explore amsterdam loved quiet location easy airport train tram easy shopping sight seeing breakfast excellent definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice all round package of a hotel”

Reviews.Content: amsterdam 4 friends laugh bum soak days spent ages online trying decent hotel suite bathrooms double beds breakfast thrown price loads shared bathrooms price spend wasnt appealing friends couples found hotel lot pondering city centre decided budget range loads extras decision 1015 main centre via tram quiet neighbourhood nice peaceful cherish sleep happy days hell isnt breaking loose outside hotel window staff helpful job hosting stay recommendation indonesian restaurant called btw cheers single little pokey nice balcony chill double nicely decorated slept gripe walls little thin noisy guests staying hotel breakfast simple continental style selection various bits free internet added bonus stocked alcohol cheap supermarket virtually door bars city sell drinks 5 euros pretty expensive overall id recommend except epic socialites thick centre night life getting wasted dont care fancy extras thanks helping holiday
